---
title: Curse of the Unspecified Data Definition
---

``` {r}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(leaflet)
```


``` {r}
load("paranormal01/example01.RData")
example01 %>% 
    mutate( 
        Location = gsub(
            pattern = "<.+>", 
            replacement = "", 
            x = iconv(
                Location, 
                from = "latin1", 
                to = "ASCII", 
                sub = "byte"))) %>% 
    leaflet %>%
    addTiles() %>%  
    # raises informative error message
    addMarkers(popup = ~Location)
```
